channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: San + Plop
item.dc:creator: San + Plop
item.description:
Man that rocks!
And you're both jammy bastards... Good on ya!
What's the dream job? - Philippa wants to know and is mighty jealous (I don't care cos I got my own dream job, so there).
Anyways, we've got news for you, so give us a call or mail when you get back.
Love from Wankover,
San + Phil
item.content:encoded:
Man that rocks!

And you’re both jammy bastards… Good on ya!

What’s the dream job? – Philippa wants to know and is mighty jealous (I don’t care cos I got my own dream job, so there).

Anyways, we’ve got news for you, so give us a call or mail when you get back.

Love from Wankover,

San + Phil
